title: How do we get a broadband connection cheaper compared to mobile data? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am getting an uncapped 50Mb/sec broadband connection with very little “neighbor” conflict so it is running at 50Mb/sec nearly all the time. $60 a month Wireless I am getting maybe 5–10Mb/sec from Verizon with a 24GB cap. About $40 a month. Broadband is much, much cheaper than cellular service in most of the US.
